participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Humorous and light-hearted, always looking for a good laugh to escape from life's challenges.
participant_1.background: I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life. I love the Chainsmokers. My favorite movie is Django Unchained. I've kept my deployment from my parents. I love to read fantasy novels and poetry.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, often expressing feelings through songwriting, enjoys freedom and challenges.
participant_2.background: I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs. I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot. I would not be able to weld if I was blind because I need to see the metal I am welding. I eat junk food. I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.

content.text: Not too bad. I'm currently reading a fantasy novel.
It's about a princess who is trying to save her kingdom from an evil wizard.
Oh, that sounds interesting. I like fantasy novels.
Me too. I've been reading them since I was a kid.
That's a tough question. I think I'd have to say Harry Potter.
I love Harry Potter! I've read the whole series multiple times.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new movie.
Me too! I'm going to see it opening night.
I'm not sure if I can make it opening night, but I'm definitely going to see it soon.
Good. It's going to be amazing.
